item.title: WGAは、6～12人のライターからの人員配置と、雇用の最低週数の保証という2つの主なこだわりを含む提案を詳細に説明する（Gene Maddaus/Variety）
item.description:
Gene Maddaus / Variety:
The WGA details its proposals, including two main sticking points: a staffing minimum from 6-12 writers and a guaranteed minimum number of weeks of employment  —  The Writers Guild of America has detailed the vast differences between writers and the studios that led to the first strike in 15 years, which will begin Tuesday.

item.title: 音楽レーベルは著作権侵害を理由にストリーミングサービスからAIボイスクローン曲を取り下げているが、専門家によるとそのアプローチはそれほど単純ではないらしい（Mia Sato/The Verge）
item.description:
Mia Sato / The Verge:
Music labels are taking down AI voice clone songs from streaming services by citing copyright infringement, an approach experts say is not so straightforward  —  Major record labels are going after AI-generated songs, arguing copyright infringement.  Legal experts say the approach is far from straightforward.

item.title: 英国の裁判所は、GuardianのジャーナリストであるCarole Cadwalladrに対し、Arron Banksの名誉毀損判決に対する控訴が一部成功した後、35Kポンドの賠償金を支払うよう命じた（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
A UK court orders Guardian journalist Carole Cadwalladr to pay £35K in damages to Arron Banks after the businessman's part-successful appeal of a libel ruling  —  Brexit donor Arron Banks is entitled to damages over Carole Cadwalladr's Ted Talk, appeal judges have ruled.

item.title: Politicoの創設者Robert Allbrittonが、政治記者志望者を育成し、最終的に報道機関を立ち上げるNPOの設立に$20Mをコミット（Max Tani/Semafor)
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Politico founder Robert Allbritton commits $20M to launch a nonprofit that will train aspiring political reporters and eventually launch a news organization  —  The Scoop  —  The founder of Politico is launching a new nonprofit news organization that promises to help jumpstart the careers …

item.title: 調査：米国成人の約75％がニュースメディアが政治的偏向を強めていると回答、～60％が誤報の責任をニュースメディアが負うと回答（David Klepper/Associated Press)
item.description:
David Klepper / Associated Press:
Survey: nearly 75% of US adults say news media is increasing political polarization, and ~60% say news media bears the blame for misinformation  —  When it comes to the news media and the impact it's having on democracy and political polarization in the United States, Americans are likelier to say it's doing more harm than good.

item.title: The Late Show、The Tonight Show、Jimmy Kimmel Live！、その他の深夜番組は、ライターがストライキに合意したため、火曜日から暗転することになった（Peter White/Deadline）
item.description:
Peter White / Deadline:
The Late Show, The Tonight Show, Jimmy Kimmel Live!, and other late-night shows are set to go dark starting Tuesday, after writers agreed to strike  —  Nightly talk shows including The Late Show with Stephen Colbert, Jimmy Kimmel Live! and The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon …

item.title: WGA、AMPTPとの交渉が合意に至らず、スタジオ側の対応が「全く不十分」とし、火曜日からのストライキを要求（Variety)
item.description:
Variety:
The WGA calls for a strike starting Tuesday after negotiations with the AMPTP concluded with no agreement, saying studios' responses were “wholly insufficient”  —  The Alliance of Motion Picture and Television Producers ended contract talks with the Writers Guild of America on Monday night …

item.title: Amazon、Fire TVデバイス向けのFASTビデオ体験「Fire TV Channels」を展開、FASTコンテンツの月間ストリーミング時間が過去6カ月で300％以上増加したことを受けて（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）。
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Amazon rolls out Fire TV Channels, its FAST video experience for Fire TV devices, after monthly hours streamed of FAST content grew 300%+ in the past six months  —  Amazon is doubling down on free, ad-supported content with today's introduction of Fire TV Channels, its new, free and ad-supported …

item.title: 映画アカデミー、アンドレア・ライズボローの意外な演技賞ノミネートを受けて、プライベートイベントやソーシャルメディア利用など、新たなオスカーキャンペーンルールを設定（Pete Hammond/Deadline)
item.description:
Pete Hammond / Deadline:
The Motion Picture Academy sets new Oscar campaign rules for private events, social media use, and more after Andrea Riseborough's surprising acting nomination  —  The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences on Monday revealed its updated rules and regulations for the 96th annual Academy Awards.

item.title: 情報筋によるとVice Mediaは破産申請の準備中。情報筋によると、5社以上が買収に興味を示しているが、チャンスは少ないとのこと（New York Times）。
item.description:
New York Times:
Sources: Vice Media is preparing to file for bankruptcy; a source says more than five companies have expressed interest in acquiring it but chances are slim  —  The company, which was once valued at $5.7 billion, has been struggling to find a buyer this year.

item.title: SpotifyのFindawayが、インディーズ作家向けのオーディオブック配信会社Findaway Voicesが、Spotifyで購入したオーディオブックに対する20％の配信手数料を取り止めると発表（Amrita Khalid/The Verge）。
item.description:
Amrita Khalid / The Verge:
Spotify's Findaway says Findaway Voices, its audiobook distributor for indie authors, is dropping its 20% distribution fee for audiobooks purchased on Spotify  —  Spotify-owned audiobooks seller Findaway will no longer take a 20 percent cut of royalties for titles sold on its DIY Voices platform …

item.title: Automattic、WordPressプラグインJetPackのブログ記事自動ツイート機能を停止予定、TwitterがAPI条件と価格を大幅に変更したことを理由に（Matt Binder/Mashable)
item.description:
Matt Binder / Mashable:
Automattic plans to drop its WordPress plugin JetPack's ability to automatically tweet blog posts, citing Twitter's dramatic change to its API terms and pricing  —  Twitter continues to lose vital support from major companies.  —  When users set up a brand new WordPress-powered website …

item.title: ソースはこちらシンクレアは、先週閉鎖した2つのニュースルームに加え、今後数カ月でさらに3つのローカルニュース業務をThe National Deskに置き換える予定です（Matthew Keys/The Desk）。
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Source: Sinclair plans to replace three more local news operations with The National Desk in the coming months, on top of two newsrooms shutting down last week  —  Three more local television stations will shut down their local news operations, with even more slated to close in the coming months.

item.title: FCC判事が、Standard Generalによるテレビ放送局Tegnaの買収に関する審査を一時停止し、5月22日に融資の期限が切れるため、この取引を中止する可能性が高い（John Eggerton/Next TV）。
item.description:
John Eggerton / Next TV:
An FCC judge suspends her review of Standard General's acquisition of TV broadcaster Tegna, likely killing the deal as financing is set to expire on May 22  —  Says, in effect, why start the process if deal may crater anyway  —  There will now definitely not be any action …

item.title: Amazon、無料ストリーミングサービス「Freevee」（旧IMDB TV）で100以上のPrime Videoオリジナルシリーズや映画を2023年中順次配信する予定（Sarah Fielding/Engadget
item.description:
Sarah Fielding / Engadget:
Amazon plans to make 100+ Prime Video original series and movies available on its free streaming service Freevee, formerly IMDB TV, gradually throughout 2023  —  Amazon has announced it's making over 100 Prime Video original series and movies available on Freevee, its free streaming service.
